title.value: V2 Table Code System: Product Source

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to describe the evaluation state of a product identified in an incident. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PCR segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0248 (Product Source)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Actual product involved in incident was evaluated

definition.value: Actual product involved in incident was evaluated

display.value: A product from the same lot as the actual product involved was evaluated

definition.value: A product from the same lot as the actual product involved was evaluated

display.value: A product from a reserve sample was evaluated

definition.value: A product from a reserve sample was evaluated

display.value: A product from a controlled/non-related inventory was evaluated

definition.value: A product from a controlled/non-related inventory was evaluated
